languages.text: {n}Мститель зажимает жертве рот, и остро заточенные ножницы легко пронзают тело дворянина. Спустя секунду мертвец соскальзывает на землю, а убийца смотрит на вас с безумным блеском в глазах.{/n} "Вы ладно скроены, пускай и не с Тассеры. Позвольте мне уйти, и я перекрою весь мир по вашему подобию".

{n}The attacker clamps a hand over the nobleman's mouth and the sharpened scissors easily pierce his flesh. A second later, the dead man slips to the ground, and the killer looks up at you with a mad glint in his eyes.{/n} "You cut a fine figure, though you're not from Thassera. Let me go, and I'll stitch the entire world in your image."
languages.original_text: {n}Мститель зажимает жертве рот, и остро заточенные ножницы легко пронзают тело дворянина. Спустя секунду мертвец соскальзывает на землю, а убийца смотрит на вас с безумным блеском в глазах.{/n} "Вы ладно скроены, пускай и не с Тассеры. Позвольте мне уйти, и я перекрою весь мир по вашему подобию".

languages.text: {n}袭击者用手捂住了贵族的嘴巴，锋利的剪刀轻而易举地刺穿了他的身体。一秒钟之后，死者倒在了地上，而凶手抬起头，看着你，双眼中闪烁着疯狂的光芒。{/n}“你的脸真漂亮，尽管你并不是塔瑟拉人。让我走吧，我会把整个世界都绣成你的模样。”
languages.original_text: {n}The attacker clamps a hand over the nobleman's mouth and the sharpened scissors easily pierce his flesh. A second later, the dead man slips to the ground, and the killer looks up at you with a mad glint in his eyes.{/n} "You cut a fine figure, though you're not from Thassera. Let me go, and I'll stitch the entire world in your image."

traits.locale_text: {n}袭击者用手捂住了贵族的嘴巴，锋利的剪刀轻而易举地刺穿了他的身体。一秒钟之后，死者倒在了地上，而凶手抬起头，看着你，双眼中闪烁着疯狂的光芒。{/n}“你的脸真漂亮，尽管你并不是塔瑟拉人。让我走吧，我会把整个世界都绣成你的模样。”

languages.text: {n}襲撃者は貴族の口を押さえ込んだ。鋭く研がれたハサミが容易く肉に突き刺さる。一瞬後、死んだ男が地面に崩れ落ち、殺人者は狂気に輝く目であなたを見上げた。{/n}「見栄えがするな、タッセーラの者ではないが。俺を解放してくれたら、この惑星をすべて、お前の理想のかたちに縫い直してやるよ」
languages.original_text: {n}The attacker clamps a hand over the nobleman's mouth and the sharpened scissors easily pierce his flesh. A second later, the dead man slips to the ground, and the killer looks up at you with a mad glint in his eyes.{/n} "You cut a fine figure, though you're not from Thassera. Let me go, and I'll stitch the entire world in your image."

traits.locale_text: {n}襲撃者は貴族の口を押さえ込んだ。鋭く研がれたハサミが容易く肉に突き刺さる。一瞬後、死んだ男が地面に崩れ落ち、殺人者は狂気に輝く目であなたを見上げた。{/n}「見栄えがするな、タッセーラの者ではないが。俺を解放してくれたら、この惑星をすべて、お前の理想のかたちに縫い直してやるよ」

languages.text: {n}El agresor aprieta su mano contra la boca del noble y sus afiladas tijeras perforan fácilmente su carne. Un instante después, el noble se desploma sin vida en el suelo, y su asesino te mira con un destello de locura en los ojos.{/n} «Tiene usted buen porte, aunque no es de Thassera. Deje que me vaya y zurciré el mundo entero a su imagen y semejanza».
languages.original_text: {n}The attacker clamps a hand over the nobleman's mouth and the sharpened scissors easily pierce his flesh. A second later, the dead man slips to the ground, and the killer looks up at you with a mad glint in his eyes.{/n} "You cut a fine figure, though you're not from Thassera. Let me go, and I'll stitch the entire world in your image."

traits.locale_text: {n}El agresor aprieta su mano contra la boca del noble y sus afiladas tijeras perforan fácilmente su carne. Un instante después, el noble se desploma sin vida en el suelo, y su asesino te mira con un destello de locura en los ojos.{/n} «Tiene usted buen porte, aunque no es de Thassera. Deje que me vaya y zurciré el mundo entero a su imagen y semejanza».

languages.text: {n}Saldırgan, eliyle soylunun ağzını kapatıyor. Keskin makası, adamın etini zahmetsizce deşiveriyor. Çok geçmeden adamın cansız bedeni, kendisini yavaşça yere bırakıyor. Katil, azgın bir öfkeyle parlayan gözlerini sana doğrultuyor.{/n} "Thasseralı değilsin ama esaslı çıktın. Beni bırakmazsan seni de biçerim, haberin olsun."
languages.original_text: {n}The attacker clamps a hand over the nobleman's mouth and the sharpened scissors easily pierce his flesh. A second later, the dead man slips to the ground, and the killer looks up at you with a mad glint in his eyes.{/n} "You cut a fine figure, though you're not from Thassera. Let me go, and I'll stitch the entire world in your image."

traits.locale_text: {n}Saldırgan, eliyle soylunun ağzını kapatıyor. Keskin makası, adamın etini zahmetsizce deşiveriyor. Çok geçmeden adamın cansız bedeni, kendisini yavaşça yere bırakıyor. Katil, azgın bir öfkeyle parlayan gözlerini sana doğrultuyor.{/n} "Thasseralı değilsin ama esaslı çıktın. Beni bırakmazsan seni de biçerim, haberin olsun."

languages.text: {n}L'assaillant bâillonne le noble de sa main tandis que ses ciseaux affûtés percent sa chair sans difficulté. Une seconde plus tard, le mort glisse au sol et le tueur vous lance un regard où brille une étincelle de folie.{/n} « Bien que vous ne soyez pas originaire de Thassera, vous avez fière allure. Laissez-moi partir et je recoudrai le monde tout entier à votre image. »
languages.original_text: {n}The attacker clamps a hand over the nobleman's mouth and the sharpened scissors easily pierce his flesh. A second later, the dead man slips to the ground, and the killer looks up at you with a mad glint in his eyes.{/n} "You cut a fine figure, though you're not from Thassera. Let me go, and I'll stitch the entire world in your image."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'assaillant bâillonne le noble de sa main tandis que ses ciseaux affûtés percent sa chair sans difficulté. Une seconde plus tard, le mort glisse au sol et le tueur vous lance un regard où brille une étincelle de folie.{/n} « Bien que vous ne soyez pas originaire de Thassera, vous avez fière allure. Laissez-moi partir et je recoudrai le monde tout entier à votre image. »

languages.text: {n}Der Angreifer legt dem Adeligen eine Hand auf den Mund, und die scharfe Schere gleitet mühelos in sein Fleisch. Eine Sekunde später liegt der Mann tot am Boden, und sein Mörder blickt mit einem wahnsinnigen Funkeln in den Augen zu dir auf.{/n} "Ihr macht eine gute Figur, obwohl Ihr nicht von Thassera stammt. Lasst mich gehen, und ich werde die ganze Welt in Eurem Antlitz nähen."
languages.original_text: {n}The attacker clamps a hand over the nobleman's mouth and the sharpened scissors easily pierce his flesh. A second later, the dead man slips to the ground, and the killer looks up at you with a mad glint in his eyes.{/n} "You cut a fine figure, though you're not from Thassera. Let me go, and I'll stitch the entire world in your image."
